name: Aryan Saxena
about: Management Consulting Associate at BCG with a background in investment banking and strategy roles in leading tech startups. Specializes in driving strategy and financial analysis to address complex business problems. Dedicated to leveraging insights for significant decisions and growth. Always open to new opportunities to learn and make a positive impact.

experience.title: Delegate
experience.description: The Harvard Project for Asian and International Relations (HPAIR) is an internationally recognized student-run organization of Harvard University. HPAIR organizes Harvard University's largest annual student conference, offering a forum of exchange to facilitate discussion of the most important economic, political, and social issues relevant to the Asia-Pacific region.

organizations.title: Business Club, IIT Kharagpur
organizations.description: B-Club, IIT Kharagpur, is a non-profit organization aiming to familiarize its members, with the technicalities of analytics,finance and consultancy. We strive to enhance our knowledge through in-house sessions, presentations, hands-on workshops and discussions. Matters deliberated vary from practical problems to hypothetical ones. The club serves as an excellent interface among students, professionals, faculty and alumni and develops the members into creative thinkers and strategists much before they step into the big world of business
